_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The six powers of a Realized One [an6.64: Truly understanding the possible as possible and the impossible as impossible
Truly understanding the result of deeds undertaken in the past, future, and present in terms of causes and reasons
Truly understanding corruption, cleansing, and emergence regarding the absorptions, liberations, immersions, and attainments
Recollecting many kinds of past lives
Having clairvoyance that is purified and superhuman
Realizing the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this very life
Questions asked to the Realized One [an6: True knowledge of the possible as possible and the impossible as impossible
True knowledge of the result of deeds undertaken in the past, future, and present in terms of causes and reasons
True knowledge of corruption, cleansing, and emergence regarding the absorptions, liberations, immersions, and attainments
True knowledge of recollection of past lives
True knowledge of passing away and rebirth of sentient beings
True knowledge of the ending of defilements
The importance of immersion [an6.64:13.7: True knowledge of the possible as possible and the impossible as impossible is for those with immersion, not for those without immersion
True knowledge of the result of deeds undertaken in the past, future, and present in terms of causes and reasons is for those with immersion, not for those without immersion
True knowledge of corruption, cleansing, and emergence regarding the absorptions, liberations, immersions, and attainments is for those with immersion, not for those without immersion
True knowledge of the recollection of past lives is for those with immersion, not for those without immersion
True knowledge of the passing away and rebirth of sentient beings is for those with immersion, not for those without immersion
True knowledge of the ending of defilements is for those with immersion, not for those without immersion
